WorkItem.Description:
NREL does analysis and posts data using utility service territories:
http://en.openei.org/wiki/File:2012_12_14_Electricity_Price-01.jpg

Billy Roberts is listed on the map:
http://www.nrel.gov/analysis/staff/billy_roberts.html

Not sure of their sourcing...

This could enable:
* developers to more easily determine the local utility for interconnection
* could be linked to the interconnection webpage for that utility (source is probably DSIRE)
* could be linked to any renewable energy policies (source is probably DSIRE)
* could be linked to existing or past utility RFPs (through SEPA's USD, http://usd.solarelectricpower.org/summarytables/index.cfm?view=procurement)
* could be linked to current or past utility Integrated Resource Plans (through SEPA's USD, http://usd.solarelectricpower.org/summarytables/index.cfm?view=reports)
WorkItem.Summary: Investigate Electric Utility Service Territory layers

Comments.Message: These data are not widely available from a consistant source. As such, we will not be implementing this feature.
